text: Boreothrinax is a genus of flies in the family Pyrgotidae. == Species == *B. debilis (Osten Sacken, 1877) *B. dichaetus Steyskal, 1978 *B. filiola (Loew, 1876) *B. maculipennis (Macquart, 1846) *B. shewelli Steyskal, 1978 == References == Category:Pyrgotidae Category:Diptera of North America
title: Boreothrinax
